Try typing
yo<Tab> 	enables tab folding
yox     	set tab width
y<      	decrease width
y>      	increase width
yoc     	toggles concealcursor: current line is not concealed
yo,     	toggles separation character between <Tab> and ,

You can always dispel the concealment by entering visual mode or insert mode.
